greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: a(n, k) is the denominator of (n + (n-1) + ... + (n-k+1))/(1 + 2 + ... + k), 0 < k <= n.
comment: A109613(n+1) - 2 = 2*floor((n+1)/2) - 1 is the largest number in row n. [Corrected by _Petros Hadjicostas_, Oct 20 2019]
